sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnonlinepollresult ( POLL_RESULT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , POLL_IEM_ID /* */ , POLL_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #pollResultId# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #pollIemId# /* */ , #pollId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnonlinepollresult SET POLL_RESULT_ID=#pollResultId# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , POLL_IEM_ID=#pollIemId# /* */ , POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */ WHERE POLL_RESULT_ID=#pollResultId# /* */ AND POLL_IEM_ID=#pollIemId# /* */ AND POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnonlinepollresult WHERE POLL_RESULT_ID=#pollResultId# /* */ AND POLL_IEM_ID=#pollIemId# /* */ AND POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT POLL_RESULT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , POLL_IEM_ID /* */ , POLL_ID /* */ FROM comtnonlinepollresult WHERE POLL_RESULT_ID=#pollResultId# /* */ AND POLL_IEM_ID=#pollIemId# /* */ AND POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */

SELECT POLL_RESULT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , POLL_IEM_ID /* */ , POLL_ID /* */ FROM comtnonlinepollresult WHERE 1=1
POLL_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FRST_REGISTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY POLL_RESULT_ID DESC /* */ , POLL_IEM_ID DESC /* */ , POLL_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnonlinepollresult WHERE 1=1
POLL_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FRST_REGISTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
